name: Neko Defense
description:
You can control cat with WASD;

You can shoot lemon with '<';

You can shoot meat with '>';

Wolves will be automatically generated, and they will eat your fishes, which you should protect;

You cannot touch wolves directly;

If you shoot a wolf with lemon, it will die and possibly become meat that you can collect;

If you shoot a wolf with meat, it will join you as a dog, which will defense a certain fish from wolves;

When all fishes are defensed, you win!
